basics.name: Stephan Randle
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: Full Stack Web Developer with 3 years of proven expertise in designing and implementing innovative solutions. Skilled in both front-end and back-end technologies, specializing in ReactJS, NodeJS, and database management. Demonstrated success in contributing to the development and deployment of dynamic web applications. Eager to leverage my technical proficiency to drive excellence in cutting-edge projects and contribute to the success of forward-thinking teams.

work.name: United Wholesale Mortgage (UWM)
work.summary: UWM is the nation’s largest wholesale mortgage lender, serving independent mortgage brokers across the United States.
highlights: Developed and maintained responsive, production-grade web applications using Next.js and Node.js.
Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth integration across frontend, backend, and CMS systems.
Led the establishment of coding standards and best practices, improving code quality and consistency while fostering a culture of mentorship and knowledge sharing.
Integrated data from a .NET (C#) backend and Contentstack CMS, enabling efficient, real-time data flow using standards-based schema validation (Yup, Zod).
Designed and implemented a system that programmatically mapped Contentstack CMS content to React components, significantly improving development speed and application scalability.
Built cohesive, accessible UI components using Material UI, ensuring a consistent and polished user experience.
Authored comprehensive unit and component tests with React Testing Library and Vitest; leveraged Storybook and Zeplin to streamline component development and validation.
Automated infrastructure and developer workflows by writing scripts for infrastructure-as-code and contributing to monorepo tooling, supporting a vertically sliced microfrontend architecture.

work.name: AXYS Global
work.summary: Pied Piper is a multi-platform technology based on a proprietary universal compression algorithm that has consistently fielded high Weisman Scores™ that are not merely competitive, but approach the theoretical limit of lossless compression.
highlights: Developed and maintained HMI interfaces using FactoryTalk, ensuring user-friendly interactions and seamless integration with control systems.
Conducted thorough testing and troubleshooting to ensure the reliability and performance of electrical systems.

references.name: Caleb Vandermaas
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Stephan, his performance and dedication to detail is admirable
